backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing tools, submissions, collections, profiles, and admin‑gated operations with access control and slug generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing several frontend tool‑related components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router defining public and admin routes with admin protection and layout integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and backend admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login and logout with state feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with disclaimer, copyright text, and external link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Site header with navigation, search bar, mobile menu, CTA, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/legal/Disclaimer: Renders a styled disclaimer text pulled from i18n.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Bread: Displays a breadcrumb navigation trail with optional links and separators.
frontend/src/components/newsletter/Newsl: Provides a newsletter signup form with email validation and subscription mutation.
frontend/src/components/pagination/Pagin: Implements a pagination UI with page buttons, ellipsis handling, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/tools/PricingBad: Shows a colored badge representing a tool’s pricing tier.
frontend/src/components/tools/SimilarToo: Displays a grid of similar tools using ToolCard components.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolCard.t: Renders a card showing a tool’s details, pricing badge, and link to its page or official site.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolsSearc: Offers search input, filter buttons, and sort options for browsing tools.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations for tools, submissions, and newsletter data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating tool, collection, and newsletter data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Updates document title, meta description, and optional JSON-LD tags on mount and cleans up on unmount.
frontend/src/i18n/en.ts: Defines English translation strings for UI sections including header, home, tools, submit, newsletter, and footer.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Exports a simple translation function that resolves dot‑separated keys using the English dictionary.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base layers, color variables, dark mode overrides, and global typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/constants.ts: Lists allowed categories, pricing tags, and pricing badge colors for tool metadata.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Parses CSV text into rows with error tracking, including a custom CSV line parser handling quotes and commas.
frontend/src/lib/export/csvExport.ts: Converts 2D string arrays to downloadable CSV files using a Blob and temporary link.
frontend/src/lib/seo/jsonLd.ts: Generates JSON-LD snippets for tools and breadcrumb navigation based on schema.org formats.
frontend/src/lib/validation/toolValidati: Validates tool submission fields, checks URLs, word counts, allowed values, and provides normalization helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission details and disclaimer while applying SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page linking to tool management, bulk upload, submissions, and newsletter sections.
Admin interface for browsing, searching, and deleting tools with a table view and status indicators.
Provides a CSV upload interface for tools, validates each row, displays results, and uploads valid tools via an admin mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/NewsletterAdmin: Fetches newsletter subscriber emails, displays them in a table, and allows exporting the list to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionsRevi: Lists pending tool submissions and enables admins to approve or reject each entry with feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of allowed categories linking to filtered tools and sets page SEO metadata.
Fetches and displays a single collection with its tools, handles loading and not-found states, and sets SEO.
frontend/src/pages/CollectionsPage.tsx: Lists featured collections with links to detail pages, includes loading state, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page that loads featured tools, collections, and newest tools while rendering hero content and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitToolPage.tsx: Form page allowing users to submit a tool with validation and mutation handling, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/ToolDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single tool, sets SEO metadata, and loads similar tools with breadcrumb navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsListingPage.tsx: Lists tools with pagination, search, filters, and sorting, switching between paginated and search results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme customizations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, requirements, architecture notes, and version metadata.
